title: Why Graves no cigar? (physics)
body:
I'm trying to make a video regarding Graves in real life physics and sorta encountered  problem with actually relating all the information to why he actually doesn't have a cigar which is kinda bugging me. Anybody with any ideas please chuck me some sort of reason relating to the recoil, or the force or anything physics really would help greatly ^_^

Thanks

Oh and by the way, i'll make sure to credit yall in the video XD

replies.body:
Just give him a Cigar, it can never truly be graves without 1

Riot removed the cigar because it "encouraged" smoking in young children
b4 rito rmove cigar he run mi life, but then removed! now i dont smoke the marrywana anymor!

It's simple physics my friend.

Cigar = Badass
No cigar = No badass
No badass = No power
No power = No victory
No victory = Unbroken chains
The force shall not set Graves free.
Thanks Rito.

...

What were we talking about?
because some countries dont allow it
